des:
With this skill, you can control and monitor your fridge, freezer and fridge-freezer.

Features:
* Control the temperature of your fridge or freezer compartment
* Turn Super freeze, Super cooling, Fresh, Vacation, and Eco modes on or off
* Get notified when your water filter needs to be replaced and you want to reorder it with smart reorders via the Alexa app. Available only in US.
* Add your refrigerator to Alexa routines:
** Adjust the temperature on your fridge to prepare for guests by adding it to a party routine
** Add your refrigerator appliance to your Sabbath routine to make sure all devices are in Sabbath mode
** Let Alexa put your fridge in vacation mode when you head out by adding it to your vacation routine
** Open the fridge/freezer door hands-free when you say your chosen voice command. Availability depending on the refrigerator model

Selection of supported commands:
"Alexa, set my Refrigerator to 3 degrees"
"Alexa, set Freezer to -18 degrees"
"Alexa, turn on super freeze on my Freezer"
"Alexa, turn on super cooling on my Fridge"
"Alexa, turn off Sabbath mode on Refrigerator"
"Alexa, turn on vacation mode on Fridge"
* Use the name you chose for your device in the Alexa app

Further tips:
* To add your refrigerating appliance to a routine, just add an action and then select your appliance under "Smart Home". Here, you can choose what you want your refrigerating appliance to do.
* If you have any issues with the skill, please try re-enabling it.
* To use this skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. You can register an account in the Home Connect app. Please also make sure that you pair your refrigerating appliance with the Home Connect app.
* Please make sure the super freeze and super cooling modes are turned off when you enable the skill and discover your device.
* This skill supports freezers, fridges and wine coolers with Home Connect from Bosch, Siemens, Neff, Gaggenau and Thermador.
* Smart reorders is supported by appliances equipped with the ultra clarity pro water filter.

Please be aware that the skill might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience.
